message: Emergency update: Announcing new feature launch

data.title: 🔥 New Feature Launch: Vault33 Integration
data.content:
🔥 Breaking News!

We're excited to announce the launch of Vault33 Integration!

What's Included:

  • 🔐 Secure token storage
  • 🎮 Gamification features
  • 🤖 Discord & Telegram bot integration
  • ⚡ Real-time XRPL validator

Learn More →
